name: BalanceFrom 10x4 Feet 4-Panel Folding Gymnastics Mat – 2-Inch Thick Pad with Vinyl Surface and Carrying Handles for Tumbling, Yoga, Pilates, Home Workouts, and Martial Arts
short_description: Versatile Exercise Mat: Purple 4-panel 10 ft. x 4 ft. x 2 in. folding mat for gymnastics, yoga, Pilates, aerobics, martial arts, and more; offering a safer, cushioned surface for a variety of workouts
Extra Thick Comfort: 2 inches of padding cushions knees, back, and joints as you transition between exercises; reinforced stitching provides durable support for gymnasts and fitness enthusiasts
Non-Slip, Easy Clean Surface: Double-sided vinyl cover resists moisture and wipes clean after use; textured finish keeps the mat stable and secure on any indoor flooring as you jump or stretch
Connect Multiple Mats: Hook-and-loop edges support connecting multiple mats together to expand workout areas or keep the folded 4 ft. x 4 ft. x 8 in. dimensions firm to carry or store
Lightweight, Portable Design: Featuring built-in handles and weighing just 15 lbs for easy storage inside the closet, placement in your car, and transport to the gym, studio, or around the house
product_description: Bring comfort, safety, and versatility to every workout or practice session with the BalanceFrom Folding Gymnastics Mat. Measuring 10 feet long by 4 feet wide by 2 inches thick (120 x 48 inches), this extra-large training surface is made for tumbling, yoga, Pilates, light aerobics, martial arts, stretching, and more. The thicker 2-inch depth is filled with firm padding that cushions and supports joints, helping to safeguard your knees, back, elbows, and spine during high-impact movements. Designed for security, the double-sided, non-slip vinyl surface keeps the padded mat firmly in place and resists moisture, making cleaning it quick and easy. Reinforced stitching adds durability and enhanced strength during daily use. With hook-and-loop strips on all four sides, you can securely connect multiple BalanceFrom 10’x4’x2” mats together, creating a larger workout or tumbling area customized to your floor space. When training is over, the 4-panel foldable design reduces this exercise equipment accessory down to 4 feet long by 4 feet wide by 8 inches thick (48 x 48 inches). Built-in carrying handles make transport simple, whether moving it around indoors, taking it to the garage, or bringing it to the gym or studio. Lightweight at only 15 pounds, its compact size is easy to move, store, and take on the go. Whether you’re building a home gym, outfitting a studio, or providing safer flooring for activity and play, the BalanceFrom 10ft x 4ft x 2in All-Purpose Folding Gymnastic Mat offers the functional blend of comfort, portability, and durability for adults and users of all ages.
